main event: On August 28, 1949, Mr. and Mrs. and Mr. and Mrs. sighted three flying discs in Hansville, Washington.
interesting points: The objects appeared to be approximately 25-30 feet in diameter and made of shiny metal., Observers estimated the altitude of the objects to be around 10,000 feet., The sighting lasted between 1.5 to 2 minutes., The witnesses confirmed the objects made no sound and had no visible moving parts., A weather balloon was released by a station in Seattle around the same time as the sighting.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. and Mr. and Mrs., considered reliable and trustworthy.
